author: taylor
msg: Extended Serializable interface in the following interfaces:
as they are all stored in the session.
This change is required to use the reloadable webapp feature in tomcat.
Added a null pointer check in the method DatabasePsmlManagerService.shutdown().
This change is required due to the feature put in earlier which makes caching optional in DatabasePsmlManagerService.

author: taylor
msg: Fixed bug to handle category filtering. Removed the code to reuse the portlet list and the allportlets list from the session.

The portlet list is still stored in the session, however it is used only by maintainUserSelections() method. The userSelectionMap is updated on filtering, or when previous/next are clicked. On clicking apply all the entries in the userSelectionMap are committed.Added start parameter to the url after doFilterCategory is called as otherwise the session variables are cleared.

author: taylor
msg: changed private to protected in order to extend CastorPsmlManagerService
